page.description: Moves a word in a list to the specified location.
page.prototype: New_List as C = word_move(C cString ,N nFrom ,N nTo [,C cDelimiter ])

argument.name: cString
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words or entries.

argument.name: nFrom
argument.description: The position of the word or entry to move. Numeric

argument.name: nTo
argument.description: The new position of the word or entry. Numeric

page.discussion: The WORD_MOVE() function moves a word or entry from one position to another in a CR-LF delimited list.
page.example: dim s as C s = <<%a% bird cow chicken goat %a% ? word_move(s, 2, 4) = bird chicken goat cow
